item.title: Version 1.2.0
item.description:
Changes

  • Added support for LUA scripting of the input system
  • Updated the Oculus SDK to 1.20
  • Performance optimizations to reduce translation overhead

Known issues

  • Changing the settings while the game is running is not supported
  • Xbox Controller support on a few games might be broken, this will be fixed in the next version
  • Multiple users reported issues with the SteamVR version of Dirt Rally, last known good version for that game is 1.1.11
